contexts.context: ...prepared to unleash a fireball to incinerate him. Before he had <mark>uttered</mark> the first word of the spell, he suddenly found that...
...he discovered that the estate that he would be inheriting was <mark>utterly</mark> dissolute by decades of blight storms and poor crops.
...slaughter, and terrible sorceries were used, resulting in the <mark>utter</mark> extermination of House Dwemer, House Dagoth, and their allies...
